subject: The top five Seguno features of 2025
description_text:

 Hi there, 
 In 2025, we made many improvements to Seguno Email. Here are the top five we recommend you explore. ​ 
 Install Seguno for free 
 



 
 




 
 

 5️⃣ Granular targeting to drive conversions
 
 Target by overall engagement over time or by interactions with a specific email or automation. 
 [Image "targeting+square+2025+year+end+product+update+email.png?expires=1782967788&signature=4e396cbff3ff63c255e13d9035236455337b065dc2ccb1381bc456a786fbad44&req=dSggH8x9lINfXfMW2XS%2FiX%2BsPFF7kD8lawxlpfjRnmFhNFcCVFY%3D%0A"] 
 



 
 Create a targeted email 


 4️⃣ AI Copywriter to spark ideas and save time
 
 Write high-performing emails in less time with AI for email copy, preview text, and subject lines. 
 [Image "AI+square+2025+year+end+product+update+email.png?expires=1782967788&signature=f01fb4ac75d1e2c1d4d45862c2446407e034a04486d6e97c6e410a49968a2f89&req=dSggH8x6m4RbUfMW2XS%2FiTS%2Bm%2FU32InWOarBjmJo6D83y6G94DI%3D%0A"] 
 



 
 Explore AI features 

 
 

 ​ 
 3️⃣ Improved remailing to increase open rates 
 Automatically resend emails to engaged subscribers who didn't open the first email, using a refreshed subject line to boost visibility. 
 [Image "remail+square+-+2025+year+end+product+update+email.png?expires=1782967788&signature=1b69ef7bcf73c0b10324a091db5e21dcdff6b6861cb1ea5b209d05045c95ce92&req=dSggH8x9mIdYWfMW2XS%2FiRzb8Vx%2Fby3ofLVRZkVE4oHE78CN8ZY%3D%0A"] 
 



 
 Learn about remailing 


 ​ 
 2️⃣ Shopify express checkout to boost sales 
 Add a "Buy with Shop Pay" button or link straight to checkout within your emails to turn buying intent into completed purchases. 
 [Image "shop+pay+square2025+year+end+product+update+email.png?expires=1782967788&signature=a7e54895e5d56bfef62a17a0496a6fd465dcf36022525f6cd9fc72ffd99ef17e&req=dSggH8x6moNbWPMW2XS%2FiR%2FkknHFxzMFMfDhj21wzRhj6G6zjaY%3D%0A"] 
 



 
 Add express checkout 

 
 



 
 1️⃣ Canva designs inside the editor to design effortlessly 
 Add and edit your Canva designs without leaving Seguno to keep every email consistent. Edits in Canva are automatically updated in Seguno. 
 [Image "canva+-+2025+year+end+product+update+email.png?expires=1782967788&signature=2543f06057c2e02e54a5e1e2a30352f2c4ebb211c977fad54fa4c2844803c2d1&req=dSggH852mIFZWPMW2XS%2FifzkoQDAV68AevqV5sKl9gZBIZZgnBc%3D%0A"] 
 ​
